text: Raymond "Ray" Stantz, Ph.D. is a fictional character from the Ghostbusters franchise. He appears in the movies Ghostbusters, Ghostbusters II, Casper, and the animated television series The Real Ghostbusters. In both live action movies, he was portrayed by Dan Aykroyd, and was voiced by Frank Welker. He is a member of the Ghostbusters and one of the three doctors of parapsychology, along with Dr. Peter Venkman and Dr. Egon Spengler. Category:Ghostbusters characters Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Movie characters
title: Ray Stantz
